priority.title: Priority Keywords
priority.subtitle: Set keywords that will make search results appear at the top and be highlighted

list.title: Current Priority Keywords
list.emptyMessage: Add keywords above to prioritize search results containing them!

howItWorks.title: How Priority Keywords Work
howItWorks.autoPriority: Automatic Prioritization: Search results containing any of these keywords will automatically appear at the top of the results list
howItWorks.visualHighlight: Visual Highlighting: Prioritized results will have a special visual indicator to distinguish them
howItWorks.caseInsensitive: Case Insensitive: Keywords match regardless of capitalization
howItWorks.partialMatching: Partial Matching: Keywords match if they appear anywhere in the result title

tips.title: Tips for Effective Keywords
tips.specific: Use specific terms that identify high-quality content (e.g., "BluRay", "1080p", "REMUX")
tips.trustedGroups: Add trusted release group names or encoders
tips.avoidCommon: Avoid overly common words that might match too many results
